scripts.compose:all: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.order.yml -f docker-compose.calendar.yml -f docker-compose.shop.yml -f docker-compose.obs.yml --profile obs up --build -d
scripts.up: npm run build:base && npm run compose:all
scripts.up:bare: docker build -f Dockerfile.base.nodejs -t cqrs-mvp/base:latest . && docker compose up --build -d
scripts.down: docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.obs.yml --profile obs down
